code: import{v4 as uuid}from"uuid";import{SET_ALERT,REMOVE_ALERT}from"./types";export var setAlert=function setAlert(msg,alertType){var err_key=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"";var timeout=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:1000;return function(dispatch){var id=uuid();dispatch({type:SET_ALERT,payload:{msg:msg,alertType:alertType,err_key:err_key,id:id}});};};export var removeAlert=function removeAlert(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:REMOVE_ALERT});};};
